    Package index

    All functions

    analyze_metadata()
    Analyze Refined Finna Metadata
    analyze_trends_over_time_binned()
    Analyze Trends Over Time with Binned Years (Decades)
    check_api_access()
    Check access to https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi
    enrich_author_name()
    Enrich Author Name from Finna API and Save Results
    finna_cite()
    Create a Data Bibliography for Finna Records
    finna_interactive()
    Interactive function for Finna Search
    get_finna_records()
    Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options
    load_offline_data()
    Load Finna Search Results from Offline File
    refine_metadata()
    Refine Finna Metadata
    save_for_offline()
    Save Finna Search Results for Offline Access
    search_finna()
    Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option
    search_finna_from_file()
    Search Finna using text from a file (extended version)
    search_publisher()
    Finna Publisher Search
    visualize_author_distribution()
    Visualize Distribution by Authors
    visualize_format_distribution()
    Visualize Distribution by Formats
    visualize_format_distribution_pie()
    Visualize Format Distribution as Pie Chart
    visualize_format_library_correlation()
    Visualize Correlation Between Formats and Libraries
    visualize_library_distribution()
    Visualize Distribution by Libraries
    visualize_subject_distribution()
    Visualize Distribution by Subjects
    visualize_title_year_heatmap()
    Visualize Heatmap of Titles by Year
    visualize_top_20_titles()
    Visualize Top-20 Titles by Count
    visualize_word_cloud()
    Visualize Word Cloud of Titles or Subjects with Stop Words Removal
    visualize_year_distribution()
    Visualize Year Distribution
    visualize_year_distribution_line()
    Visualize Year Distribution (Line Plot)
